extendedInfo.description: The RMV-Appliation: RMV-Tickets and time tablesEasy ticket purchase with the RMV-HandyTicket: Purchase single tickets, day passes for adults and children as well as group tickets quick and easy with your Android smartphone!Time tables with real time information: The RMV-Application offers dynamic time tables and departure plans.Your favourites: Save your most important connections to be able to get your tickets and time table information quickly.Owner of a valid BahnCard 25 or 50 can now buy single tickets with BahnCard discount if this is preselected under More->Settings->Child and BahnCard.Regional trains and S-Bahn maps: Both maps are now available under Network plans on the More-Page.

reviews.title: Super App.......ABER
reviews.comment: Neuerdings hab ich nicht mehr die moeglichkeit kurzstrecken zu kaufen. Es gibt jedesmal eine ganz normale einzelfahrt an. Das ist nervig, weil ich so wieder zurueck zum guten alten automat muss....
reviews.author: Susi Nolan

reviews.title: Nice app- more integration would be nice
reviews.comment: Great to be able to buy tickets for me. But how about more people? And showing the best price?  Not always easy to find the connection you want.  How about interactive maps?
reviews.author: Tim Hewison

reviews.title: Alternativlos
reviews.comment: Eine App, ohne die man nicht mehr leben kann. Leider sind einige funktionale Details irref\303\274hrend, was aber wohl nicht an der App. selbst liegt. Routing \303\274ber Bedarfsbusse ist f\303\274r Uninformierte wohl eher ein tragischer Witz.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: As bad as RMV public transport
reviews.comment: With the new version,  they exchanged old bugs for new ones. Still a lot of crashes. On the other hands, that like Frankfurt public transport is: bad, always late and very expansive.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Einer der besten apps
reviews.comment: In Bezug auf Funktionalit\303\244t und Usability meiner Meinung nach sehr gelungen. K\303\266nnte noch etwas schneller sein und Tickets f\303\274r Kinder anbieten, ansonsten super.
reviews.author: Matthias Rasking

reviews.title: 5 Sterne wenn...
reviews.comment: ... man endlich Monatskarten kaufen kann
reviews.author: Andreas Hoff

reviews.title: Handyticket unbrauchbar!
reviews.comment: Funktioniert leider nicht - Handy Ticket gibt nur Fehlermeldungen aus trotz Neuinstallation.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Es k\303\266nnte so sch\303\266n sein ...
reviews.comment: ... wenn es denn ginge. Leider weigert sich die App standhaft, mich anzumelden, obwohl ich mit denselben Daten auf der Webseite einloggen kann. Keine brauchbare Fehlermeldung, kein Ticketkauf m\303\266glich. Schade.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: ganz gut
reviews.comment: Pro: I love the possiblity to buy ticket on my phone. Con: It is awfully slow
reviews.author: Tam\303\241s Berki

reviews.title: Good in general
reviews.comment: Quite good and useful application in my opinion. Only thing that doesn\'t work in my case is the QR scanner. I can\'t see the camera picture, so I can\'t \"aim\" on the qr code. There is always a rmv logo covering the main part of the camera view.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Super!
reviews.comment: Tut genau was es soll. Und speichert vor allem keine Positionsdaten wie die Bahn-App zum Beispiel. Bin sehr zufrieden.  Update: wird immer besser. :-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Crashes all the time! Nexus S, ICS.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: I no longer have to carry coins with me to buy a ticket.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great.
reviews.comment: Much quicker than using a machine. Simple and easy to use.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Theoretisch gut
reviews.comment: Praktisch gehts mal, dann gehts wieder nicht.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very good. 5 stars if it had better maps, timetables and one-click change favorites access.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Worst App EVER!
reviews.comment: This is by far the worst app I have ever used. It crashed constantly. You cannot get directions to a address. It will not tell you what station is closest to an address. For example: if you want to find the next bus that goes from Darmstadt to Dieburg, you have to search for a connection to EVERY station in Dieburg manually. So, if you look for for a connection from Darmstadt Hbf to Dieburg Bf, and the next train is in 45 min, it will not tell you that there is a bus going in 5 min and stopping near DI Bf.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Funktioniert alles so, wie ichs mir vorgestellt hab. Wildfire s
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Once installed ok. Limited features, no 1st class or \"zuschlag\" tickets. Did not recognize train station of my home town but local bus station.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Sehr bedienungsunfreundlich Abel praktisch!
reviews.author: A Google User
